Uses of Class
game.Square

    • Uses of Square in game

      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Square> BoardBuilder.generateBoard()
      Generates the "board" itself by creating a list of squares, each one containing: Name, Type, Cost, Purchased
      Method parameters in game with type arguments of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void Game.executeActions(Player player, Dice dice, java.util.List<Square> board)
      Executes the game actions throughout each one.
      private void Game.resetGame(Player player, Dice dice, java.util.List<Square> board)
      Resets player's money and position on the board, dice roll count and purchased properties.
